key.name: status-refresh-rate
key.description: Change how long it takes for this extension to update the VPN status.

key.name: auto-start-on-login
key.description: When this extension first runs on boot, it will issue a connect command to ProtonVPN.

key.name: use-pkexec
key.description: ProtonVPN requires superuser privilages to issue connect/disconnect commands. pkexec will ask for your password whenever you try to connect/disconnect and doesn't require configuration. sudo will require you to disable the sudo query for the protonvpn-cli tool and will never need to ask for your password.
